vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σχίσ-μα, ατος, τό,
cleft, division, as of hoofs, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; of leaves, [Refs]; rent in a garment, [NT]
__II division of opinion, Ev Jo.[Refs]
__III the vulva, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__IV name of an ὀρχηστικὸν σχῆμα, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
__V ploughing, [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: tear, split, divide an object into parts, with an implication that the object is now damaged; by extension: division, dissension, implying discord and damage to the unity of the original group
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
tear, split, divide an object into parts, with an implication that the object is now damaged; by extension: division, dissension, implying discord and damage to the unity of the original group
a split, Mt. 9:16; Mk. 2:21; metaphorically a division into parties, schism, Jn. 7:43; 9:16; 10:19; 1Cor. 1:10; 11:18; 12:25*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: división, separación ; grupo opuesto ; rotura (en tela)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (衣服) 撕破 (太 9:16; 可 2:21)
2) 分歧, 分裂, 紛爭
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (衣服) 撕破 (太 9:16; 可 2:21)
2) 分歧, 分裂, 纷争
